text: Jeffrey Neale Jackson (born September 12, 1982) is an American politician, lawyer and military officer who has been the 52nd Attorney General of North Carolina since 2025. He has been the U.S. representative for North Carolina's 14th congressional district since 2023. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Jackson was a member of the North Carolina Senate from 2014 to 2022. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Jeff Jackson official U.S. House website * Jeff Jackson for Attorney General campaign website * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from North Carolina Category:Politicians from Miami Category:Lawyers from Miami Category:North Carolina attorneys general Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Chapel Hill, North Carolina
title: Jeff Jackson (politician)
